item.title: 循环神经网络 RNN
item.description: 与其说深度学习是一门技术，不如说深度学习是一种语言 GitHub 项目地址：AI-Project/scratch

item.title: 手写 DataLoader
item.description: class MyDataLoader: def __init__(self): self.i = 0 self._lst: list @property def lst(self): return self._lst @lst.setter def lst(self, value): self._lst = value def __iter__(self): return self def __next__(self): if self.i < len(self._lst): i = self.i self.i += 1 return self._lst[i] else: self.i = 0 raise StopIteration
